extendedInfo.description: The Ammo Reloading Cost Calculator calculates the cost per round of reloaded ammunition.  The application provides input for quantity and price of the four components used to reload ammunition (Cases, Primers, Powder, Bullets).  Press the "Calculate" button to calculate costs for 1, 25, 50, 100, 500 and 1000 rounds.  The user can also enter a custom number of rounds and the cost is automatically calculated.A pie graphs is used to show a graphical representation of the cost % for each component.The application also has an email feature that will allow the user to email the results using an email program on your phone.Pressing the Powder (lbs) label will change the units to Powder (kg).  Press again to change back to lbs.Pressing the Grains label will change the units to Grams.  Pressing Grams will change the units back to Grains.New Feature allows the user to enter the number of times cases have been reloaded.  Press the "Case" label to get a popup window to enter the usage number.See the Help information in the Menu for additional information.The application can be moved to an SD card.

reviews.title: Sponsoring add is anti-gun Bank of America
reviews.comment: Sorry can\'t positively rate app used by shooters sponsored by anti-gun group.
reviews.author: Allen Davis

reviews.title: Save feature required
reviews.comment: Some sort of save feature would be nice, otherwise a great app for reloaders.
reviews.author: Mich Obata

reviews.title: Good app overall
reviews.comment: This is a handy app 2 have 4 those of us who handload. I  agree with the previous reviews about a save feature. Would be much more handy than email.
reviews.author: Kyle Schneider

reviews.title: Will not work
reviews.comment: Won\'t open up on my zte phone
reviews.author: Kevin Grant

reviews.comment: Great calculator
reviews.author: G Simms

reviews.title: Good not great.
reviews.comment: The app works fast calculates fine. It could be a lot better. It would get five stars if you were able to save the info and it didn\'t have the adds at the top. Blank fields start would be better too.
reviews.author: Mike Canal

reviews.title: Incomplete and buggy
reviews.comment: Worked once.  Next button doesn\'t tab to the qty fields. Zeros have to be deleted before you can enter your own figures.  Cost pie is distorted.  No reset feature to set figures back to zero (or blank fields).  Reopening the app with previous figures results in \"NaN\" output when calculate pressed.  Uninstall/reinstall did not fix problems.  Samsung G S3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great.
reviews.comment: The calculations are correct.  Works very well.  Wish you could save the info.  I know this would add a lot more to this app.   Helps you determine whether to load or buy factory.
reviews.author: George Jones

reviews.comment: No save available
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Does what the title says. Simple to use and very handy when trying to figure out my savings. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: App works great. I would love to be able to save my loads so I can go back to them over times and see what each load cost without having to recalculate every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for reloaders
reviews.comment: This app does what it says, and will save me tons of napkins/notepads that I would have otherwise used for figuring out my price per round.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Get down to the nitty gritty of reload costs versus factory ammo.

reviews.title: Good app

reviews.comment: Works great

reviews.comment: Outstanding!

reviews.title: Awesome App
